name: Treemors
description:
Protect the sacred tree from the evil lumberjack menace. Grow your roots and impale the jacks, leave behind defensive structures to hamper their march and seek out deep pockets of water in the ground to empower your tree. Destroy the lumberjack camps and reclaim your grove.

Created as part the Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme Roots.

Supports both keyboard and controller play.

Controls:
L/R Arrows or Joystick : Steer root
1/2/3 or X/Y/B : Place tower
Q or A : Cancel tower placement
